thread.title: BRIEF-II-VI Inc Reports Qtrly ‍Shr Adjusted $0.39​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-II-VI Inc Reports Qtrly ‍Shr Adjusted $0.39​
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Ii-Vi Inc:
* ORPORATED REPORTS FISCAL YEAR 2018 SECOND QUARTER EARNINGS
* Q2 REVENUE ROSE 21 PERCENT TO $282 MILLION * SEES ‍Q3 REVENUES OF $270 MILLION TO $285 MILLION​ * SEES Q3‍ EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $0.33 TO $0.40​ * QTRLY ‍SHR $0.15​ * QTRLY ‍SHR ADJUSTED $0.39​ * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.37, REVENUE VIEW $277.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.42, REVENUE VIEW $288.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
